text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a ACCM

name: ActClassAccommodation
title: ActClassAccommodation
description: An accommodation is a service provided for a Person or other LivingSubject in which a place is provided for the subject to reside for a period of time. Commonly used to track the provision of ward, private and semi-private accommodations for a patient.
